definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo recognize the method of adulterating and preparation process of Pangolin adulterated with sulphate magnesium.
sentences.chinese: 目的熟悉掺硫酸镁穿山甲的掺假方法与制备过程。

sentences.english: Objective To research whether pangolin adulterated with magnesium sulfate can goods after lavation.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究搀硫酸镁穿山甲洗涤后是否能作穿山甲入药。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the effect of nitroglycerin and magnesium sulfate on eclampsism.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较硝酸甘油与硫酸镁治疗子痫前期的效果。

sentences.english: The new method of separating high temperature salt into magnesium sulfate and industrial grade salt was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种将高温盐分离成硫酸镁和工业盐的新方法。

sentences.english: The spotsare made mainly of magnesium sulfate, which crystallizes in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 这些斑点主要由湖水中的硫酸镁结晶而成。

sentences.english: The results showed that the main hydrochemical type of Qinghai salt lake is type of the magnesium sulfate.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，青海盐湖水化学类型主要为硫酸镁盐型。

sentences.english: Magnesium sulfate can improve prognosis of acute severe brain injury patients.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸镁能够改善急性重型颅脑损伤患者的预后。
